title: The purpose of this Regulation is to allow environmentally compatible uses in a zone on a given plot of land and specifically prevent non- compatible uses
clause_text: The purpose of this Regulation is to allow environmentally compatible uses in a zone on a given plot of land and specifically prevent non- compatible uses. Where an activity not specifically listed in these Regulations is proposed, its approval or rejection will be decided with the special permission of the Commissioner
section: Uses and ancillary uses permitted in the zones:
